title: Average living space of PRH tenants Hong Kong 2007 to 2019
yAxis: Average living space in square meters per person
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average living space in square meters per person, containing a total of 7 data points.
In general Average living space in square meters per person has rose over the Year.
Average living space in square meters per person is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2012.
Maximum Average living space in square meters per person, about 13.3 was reported at Year 2018, and 2019
The lowest Average living space in square meters per person, of value 12.2 was reported at Year 2007
